body: https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/7780/ seems to fix this issue.  I haven't found any test cases that it fails on (e.g., "ONE", "ONE TWO", "ONE TWO TWO", and "ONE {} TWO" all produce correct default actions now), so it's at least no worse than the status quo.  But the code isn't very easy to comprehend, so I'm not confident that I haven't overlooked some corner case.
